name: ext-path-glob-rs
description: OS-world glob + walk helpers under std.os.fs.* (deterministic ordering).
docs:
OS-world glob + walk helpers.

Modules:
- std.os.fs.glob
- std.os.fs.walk
- std.os.fs.ignore
- std.os.fs.globwalk.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-path-glob-rs@0.1.3 --sync
- Import std.os.fs.walk and std.os.fs.ignore.

Notes:
- Worlds: run-os only
- Deterministic output: sort paths lexicographically
